settings.template_description:
Ginkgo biloba is an Asian plant that was used in ancient Chinese medicine. The herb's leaves are usually used, but the seeds are shown to have the highest efficacy. Ginkgo contains numerous flavonoids and terpenoids, which promote blood flow in the body and brain. 

Ginseng and Gingko play a vital role in boosting the body’s immune system. Ginseng also provides energy to the body through compounds known as ginsenosides.*

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.content:
• Supports immune system
  • Promotes focus and memory
  • Supports blood flow
  • Provides energy

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Red Panax Ginseng Extract (Standardized to 7% Ginsenosides)(stem)(leaf), Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Powder, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf 24% Flavones, Vegetable Cellulose, Vegetable Stearate, Silicon Dioxide.

settings.heading: Directions
settings.content: As a dietary supplement, take two (2) capsules before bedtime or as directed by your healthcare professional.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content: Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if the safety seal is damaged or missing. Store in a cool, dry place.

settings.heading: + Powerful antioxidant
settings.text: Ginkgo Biloba helps to fight against free radicals, which are responsible for damaging the body’s cells.

settings.heading: + Anti-inflammatory
settings.text: Ginkgo and Ginseng have been shown to reduce the effects of arthritis, irritable bowel disease, heart disease, and cancer.

settings.heading: + Improves circulation in the body
settings.text: Ginkgo’s flavonoids and terpenoids help dilate blood vessels, increasing blood flow and, therefore, more oxygen and nutrients to the body.

settings.heading: + Benefits memory and cognitive function
settings.text: Ginseng is known to reduce stress and fight against cognitive decline.

settings.title: My energy levels are up
settings.text: I was feeling constantly tired and struggling to focus at work. Since I started taking these capsules, my energy levels have been up, and I can concentrate so much better. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Laura K.

settings.title: Improved circulation
settings.text: I've noticed better circulation and less cold hands and feet since starting this supplement. The Ginkgo Biloba really works wonders!
settings.author: Michael S.

settings.title: Feel much more proactive at work
settings.text: I was eager to try these and glad I did. Feel much more proactive at work yet I sleep like a baby at night. So far so good!
settings.author: Sophia L.

settings.title: Better memory and mental clarity
settings.text: My memory has improved significantly, and I feel much more clear-headed. This has been a game-changer for my daily productivity.
settings.author: Jason R.

settings.title: Natural energy boost
settings.text: The energy boost from the ginseng is incredible. I no longer need multiple cups of coffee to get through the day. Feeling naturally energized is amazing! I purchased one for my boyfriend too and he loves it!
settings.author: Emma T.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page. If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmed to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: This product is produced under strict quality control standards, ensuring you receive a premium product every time.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.
